document_data.name: S'domo rhan
document_data.mainbody:
The '''s'domo rhan''' was a giant beetle that was said to dwell on the [[Naktong Moors]] of [[Koryo]].<ref group="note">No game statistics are given for the s'domo rhan. It is unknown if it is a unique creature or a race of creatures. It is similar to the [[dokufu]], a spider that transforms into an old woman, in [[Oriental Adventures (3rd edition)|''Oriental Adventures'' (3rd edition)]].

The s'domo rhan had the power to transform into a beautiful woman, in which form it would lure men to their dooms.
